author: amedina
title: United States Of Crypto
description: There's a lack of a coordinated effort and shared resources for crypto advocates across the states and federal government in the US.
solution: Fund state's efforts to produce talking points, training materials for advocates, and a place to share resources for crypto advocacy.
experience:
